mapper.select: select pm.id, member_email, member_name, member_phone, member_phone, member_mileage, member_status, createdDate, updatedDate from tbl_personal_member pm join tbl_member m on pm.id = m.id

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_personal_member (id, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_birth, member_gender, member_phone, member_nickname) values (#{id}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberNickName})
